name: logbook-astro
title: Logbook Astro
desc: Logbook Astro a minimalist theme for bloggers & writers with 16+ premium pages, clean design & Tailwind CSS for seamless online presence.
article:
Key feature:

  • Google PageSpeed Score -/100 (Desktop)
  • Highly customizable (Color, Font, Menu, Social Links, SEO Meta Tags, etc.)
  • 16+ Unique Pages
  • Built with Tailwind
  • Built with Astro v5 and Tailwind CSS v4
  • Netlify & Vercel Configured
  • Google Map integrated
  • Search Feature
  • Taxonomy support
  • Contact form support
  • Disqus Comments available
  • Support OG image
  • Fully responsive on desktops, tablets, and smartphones
  • SEO Friendly
  • Clean folder structure
  • Simple and easy development environment setup
  • Free Update and Lifetime Premium Support
  • Detail Documentation.

Pages:

  1. Blog Homepage Full Width
  2. Blog Homepage Full with Left Sidebar
  3. Blog Homepage Full with Right Sidebar
  4. Blog Homepage List Style
  5. Blog Homepage List with Left Sidebar
  6. Blog Homepage List with Right Sidebar
  7. Blog Homepage Grid Style
  8. Blog Homepage Grid with Left Sidebar
  9. Blog Homepage Grid with Right Sidebar
  10. Blog Single
  11. Element
  12. Author
  13. Category
  14. Tag
  15. Contact
  16. About
  17. 404
